column4: I have a script that should start a game in a new x session, but instead just starts the x session failing to load the game
AUDIT: Mon Jul 28 09:28:25 2008: 7781 X: client 1 rejected from local host (uid 1000)
AUDIT: Mon Jul 28 09:28:25 2008: 7781 X: client 1 rejected from local host (uid 1000)
please address the channel on this; that way others can benefit
and it runs fine from hard disk?
that would eliminate one error vector
any ideas as to what is the problem because it persists even on the desktop
this was copying over the problem install of urban terror? what about a fresh install?
it runs fine in my current x session
so the error is that it wont run a new xsession? any reason not to play in the current one?
is it a problem with the game or your video card driver or other
